short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically accepts promotional offers from Chase and American Express automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some credit card companies offer promotions that can be tedious to claim manually. This extension automates the process whenever you check your credit card's available offers. This extension currently supports:
- Chase (https://secure08ea.chase.com/web/auth/dashboard/)
- American Express (https://global.americanexpress.com/offers/eligible)
- More soon?
